title: Sparkling Trinty Condo
map_address: 555 Ygnacio Valley Road near North Main
posting_body: Luxury unit available for rent at one of downtown Walnut Creek's most sought after luxury condo complexes.
Great modern open style and designer finishes, high ceilings, beautiful hardwood floors and natural light that pours in through the floor-to-ceiling windows.
This courtyard unit also features a spacious private gated patio, high-end appliances, quartz countertops, walk-in closet, designer custom window coverings, and a washer and dryer.
555 YVR residents enjoy an incredible roof-top deck complete with barbecue area, fireplace and one of the best views of Mt. Diablo you can find.
Private newly renovated fitness center and clubhouse, secure building, private gated parking and extra storage.
Just moments from dozens of restaurants, shopping, biking and running trails, two blocks from BART and the 680/24 interchange.
